did.abstract: This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts dated 1865-1867 for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church records, 1977.427, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of subscription lists, receipts, and accounts for the building fund of the Good Ground Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, N.Y. Items date from 1865 to 1867.
